settings.title:
Nurture’s in
our nature
settings.copy: Plant-based meals packed with a rainbow-bright range of nutritious ingredients. Steam, microwave, mash or purée in moments.

settings.title: Five more minutes
settings.copy: Our simple, subscription meal plans make mealtimes easier, so there's more time for you. Even if it's not much.

settings.title: Making parenting easy?
settings.copy: We can’t claim to have solved parenthood. But we do know what it takes to be a parent. In fact, we're full of helpful advice.

settings.heading: Re-opening soon
settings.newsletter_text: We're currently raiding the cupboards and rustling up some amazing new goodies for your babies! Stayed tuned and sign up to hear about our new Build a Box service and Programme Scheme!

settings.column-text: Tell us a bit about your child. Nothing too personal. Just their age and eating habits
Then we can create the ideal meal-plan to suit their ongoing development
Every 2 weeks we’ll deliver your child’s healthy, freshly-frozen meal plan

settings.heading:
Right food. 
Right time.
settings.text: Packed with a wide variety of nutrient-rich ingredients, our food pouches can be steamed, microwaved, mashed or pureed in moments.

settings.title: Can I try as a one-off without subscribing?
settings.answer: Yes! You're in control! You can skip any delivery, or pause or cancel your plan at any time.

settings.title: How many meals come in a bundle?
settings.answer: We'll send out 12 meals curated for your baby from our range of porridges, baby meals and finger foods.

settings.title: How do you design your plans?
settings.answer: We usually build a box for you, based on your little one's age. With each box you'll get more variety and more of what your baby likes.

settings.title: Can I choose my meals?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Once your first order's been placed, you'll be invited to set a password - then login and set your flavour preferences in the feedback section.

settings.title: What if my little one doesn't like the food?
settings.answer: Babies aren't going to like everything you give them, and that's totally normal (and totally frustrating!). In fact, it can take up to 20 tries of something before a baby learns a new taste. Mamamade has the most variety of any baby food delivery service, and our chefs are constantly working to release more. So if there's something your baby truly doesn't like, we can change it up whilst keeping things interesting for both of you! For more tips on introducing new flavours, be sure to check out our blog

settings.title: What makes Mamamade different?
settings.answer: Our meals are all plant-based and free from the big-8 allergens and are designed to empower you, as the parent, to shape your little one's development. You choose the texture that's right for your little one with meals that are quick to microwave or steam, mash or puree in moments.

settings.title: How much does it cost?
settings.answer: Each box of 12 meals is £33 including delivery. We'll send a box every 2 or 4 weeks.

settings.title: Mama bears club
settings.copy: Whether you're a first time mum or a 'truly seasoned' dad, all are welcome in the Mama Bears club. Here you'll earn loyalty points to spend on special treats like merch', meals and even one-to-one natters with our founders. Welcome to the club that cares about your cubs.

Right food.

settings.title: "It all began with my daughter Liba"
settings.content:
"From the moment I started introducing solids into her diet, I just wanted her to have the very best. Everything home-cooked, organic, plant-based, bursting with flavour and - of course - healthy. 

But in reality I was struggling to keep up with the pace of mealtimes on top of milk feeds."

settings.title: "I started to feel  desperate"
settings.content:
"Desperate for baby meals that weren’t sugary, store-bought puree. Just a bit of help when I was out of creativity and time, but unwilling to compromise on her health and development.

So I set to work creating a solution that helped parents like me - delicious, healthy, home-made baby meals delivered right to your door -  and so far, the response has been incredible."

settings.title: Build-a-box
settings.subheading: choose the what, when and how

settings.title: All kinds of munch for all kinds of munchkins
settings.content: Every meal is freshly frozen the moment it’s ready to keep in all its valuable nutrients. With 24 highly diverse meals available, there’s no better way to get your child a truly varied and vibrant diet.

settings.title: 1:1 COACHING SESSIONS
settings.copy: Life as a new parent can feel daunting and lonely sometimes. We’re here to offer you coaching that’s personal and relevant.

settings.copy: Whether it’s for sharing stories, seeking guidance or making new friends, our facebook group is all yours. Get stuck in.

settings.heading: Not another ‘expert’
settings.copy: Tired of getting advice from every mum, dad and their dog? Your Mamamade subscription comes with free, clear, impartial support from the people who actually know what’s what – the experts.

settings.title: Let’s raise a healthier generation
settings.content:
“Since the beginning it’s been our mission to give parents back the time, ease and confidence to cook well for their children. We do that by giving you the ingredients and tools to focus your energy where it matters: taking care of your little ones.” 

- Sophie, founder

settings.title: Lorem ipsum del et or frescre
settings.content: They say it takes a village to raise a child. But in a world where people don’t know their neighbour’s name, we need to build a new village. Let’s share the experience of parenting, the good and the bad. Our plant-based meal programs lighten the load and take the stress out of feeding the next generation.
